data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 3, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Luka Djordjevic (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In Kazan Arsenal Tula drive forward through Alesandr Lomovitskiy. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 7, Arsenal Tula's Luka Djordjevic is whistled for offside at Kazan Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 10, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Arsenal Tula drive upfield and Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
In the minute 12, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Silvije Begic (Rubin Kazan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 20, Carl Starfelt heads in to make it 1-0 at Kazan Arena.
Darko Jevtic instrumental with a fine assist.
Rubin Kazan take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Djordje Despotovic.
In the minute 22, That's a fine assist from Soltmurad Bakaev.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Soltmurad Bakaev for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Kazan Arena.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Kazan Arena.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Arsenal Tula are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 29, Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 31, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
Rubin Kazan attack but Oliver Abildgaard's header doesn't find the target.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
The match at Kazan Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Nikolay Rasskazov, who is down injured.
In the minute 32, Nikolay Rasskazov returns to the field for Arsenal Tula after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 35, Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Abdul Mohammed for Arsenal Tula drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 39, Arsenal Tula's Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot on goal at Kazan Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 41, Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Kazan Arena.
Rubin Kazan are coming forward and Darko Jevtic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 43, Vasiliy Kazarcev awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Arsenal Tula push forward at Kazan Arena and Kirill Panchenko gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rubin Kazan defence.
Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Arsenal Tula defender.
In the minute 45, Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half.
In the minute 45, Vasiliy Kazarcev blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 47, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Gia Grigalava (Arsenal Tula) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
In the minute 49, Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Hwang In-beom (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 50, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Arsenal Tula drive upfield and Kirill Panchenko gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in Rubin Kazan.
It's now 3-0 in Kazan as Soltmurad Bakaev scores for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 53, Great play from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia to set up the goal.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Evans Kangwa (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 56, Can Rubin Kazan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal Tula's half?
In Kazan, Darko Jevtic of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Kazan.
Darko Jevtic (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Free kick in a good position for Arsenal Tula!
In the minute 63, Ilya Samoshnikov for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Vasiliy Kazarcev and receives a first yellow card.
Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vasiliy Kazarcev.
In the minute 69, The away team replace Abdul Mohammed with Kings Kangwa.
Denis Makarov is replacing Djordje Despotovic for the home team.
Aleksandr Zuev is on a sub for Filip Uremovic for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 73, Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 75, Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Nikolay Rasskazov for the away team is judged to be offside.
Rubin Kazan make their third substitution with Georgi Zotov replacing Soltmurad Bakaev.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Nikolay Rasskazov with Artem Sokol. This is the second substitution made today by Sergey Podpaliy.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Arsenal Tula are back in the match in Kazan. Kirill Panchenko has scored to make it 3-1.
In the minute 83, Evans Kangwa with an assist there.
Sergey Podpaliy (Arsenal Tula) is making a third substitution, with Daniil Khlusevich replacing Kirill Panchenko.
Leonid Slutskiy is making the team's fourth substitution at Kazan Arena with Dmitri Tarasov replacing Darko Jevtic.
In Kazan Rubin Kazan attack through Aleksandr Zuev. The finish is off target, however.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Maksim Belyaev is booked for the away team.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) is making a fifth substitution, with Kirill Kosarev replacing Khvicha Kvaratskhelia.
Roman Minaev is replacing Luka Djordjevic for the away team.
In the minute 88, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Rubin Kazan needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Roman Minaev fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
Vasiliy Kazarcev awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Rubin Kazan.
Vasiliy Kazarcev signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Vasiliy Kazarcev blows to end the match. The final score is 3-1.
Rubin Kazan's Kirill Kosarev has been booked in Kazan.
